There is no improvement from what Satoshi has given us from ten years ago.

The other idea is token security.
We tokenize anything that is not securitized.

is to bring the extruded assets back to the economic and financial system through digitalization.

you have identity of the farmers, the insurance company, they are willing to insure.

And the mindset is to balance the profit and social objectives.
So there is another mindset that we must have in mass adoption,
